verses.name: Amos 9:1
verses.text: I saw the Lord standing upon the altar: and he said, Smite the lintel of the door, that the posts may shake: and cut them in the head, all of them; and I will slay the last of them with the sword: he that fleeth of them shall not flee away, and he that escapeth of them shall not be delivered.

verses.name: Amos 9:2
verses.text: Though they dig into hell, thence shall mine hand take them; though they climb up to heaven, thence will I bring them down:
